text.resource_gamma_utils.message.dynami: Dynamic Gamma has been turned on
Dynamic Gamma has been turned off
Dynamic Night Vision has been turned on
Dynamic Night Vision has been turned off
text.resource_gamma_utils.message.status: Gamma Status Effects have been turned on
Gamma Status Effects have been turned off
Night Vision Status Effect has been turned on
Night Vision Status Effect has been turned off
text.resource_gamma_utils.message.transi: Gamma Smooth Transition has been turned on
Gamma Smooth Transition has been turned off

text.resource_gamma_utils.message.incomp: This feature does not work with Dynamic Gamma enabled
This feature does not work with Dynamic Night Vision enabled
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.defaul: Gamma percentage for when Gamma is toggled off
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.toggle: Gamma percentage for when Gamma is toggled on
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.update: Enabling this will make the toggle value remember the last non default value you've used
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.gammas: Gamma percentage change for every increase or decrease
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.showst:
Show a status effect when the Gamma percentage is outside normal range 
- "High Gamma" above 100% 
- "Low Gamma" below 0%
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.reseto: Reset the Gamma value to default when Minecraft closes
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.smooth: Make the transition of toggling Gamma smoother
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.transi: Speed in percentage per second when Smooth Transition is enabled
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.enable: Makes Gamma dynamically adjust itself depending on the light level around the player
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.dynami: Dynamic transition speed in percentage per second when the light level changes
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.averag: Range in blocks around the player to average the light level of
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.skybri:
This mod uses whatever is higher; this setting or the actual sky brightness. 
This makes it possible to have a lower dynamic Gamma when under skylight. 
By default the sky brightness is 20% at midnight and 100% at noon
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.enable: Gamma will automatically be set to the preferred strength when switching dimensions
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.overwo: Preferred Gamma strength for the Overworld
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.nether: Preferred Gamma strength for the Nether
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.endpre: Preferred Gamma strength for the End
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.limitc: Should the mod enforce the minimum and maximum Gamma limits
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.mingam: Minimum Gamma percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
config.resource_gamma_utils.gamma.maxgam: Maximum Gamma percentage the mod will allow if the Limit Check is enabled
